summary:
*Parasite* is a 2019 award-winning South Korean movie directed by Bong Joon-ho. It's about a poor family tricking a rich family to work for them. The film is based on Bong's play and was inspired by real events.

The movie made history by winning the Palme d'Or at the Cannes Film Festival and the Academy Award for Best Picture, the first non-English film to do so. It also won three other Oscars and many other awards. With its unique story and excellent performances, *Parasite* has become one of the most celebrated films ever.
title: Parasite (2019 film)
